content.prompt: A depreciation of the United States dollar in foreign exchange markets will result in which of the following?

choices.label: A decrease in aggregate demand because net exports will increase.
A decrease in aggregate demand because imports will decrease.
A decrease in aggregate demand because exports will increase.
An increase in aggregate demand because imports will decrease.
An increase in aggregate demand because exports will decrease.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
